sentences.sentence: My father nudges a couple of olives toward the edge of his plate.
sentences.translation: 我爸爸轻轻地把几块小肉片菜卷推到盘子边。

sentences.sentence: But this depends on education and policy "nudges", not cheap rice.
sentences.translation: 但这取决于教育和政策“推动”，而不是便宜的大米。

sentences.sentence: He nudges them to pipe down and study. He offers his own "hectic" life as a cautionary tale.
sentences.translation: 还把自己以前“酷酷”的生活讲述给他们，让他们引以为戒。
